name: Kaiju8Game
short: A Kaiju #8 themed Defense Force game cog
description: Engage in an immersive game experience based on the Kaiju #8 manga. Join the Defense Force, battle Kaiju, gather resources, conduct research, and potentially discover your hidden Kaiju powers!
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user data including game progress, stats, resources, and achievements. Users can request data deletion at any time.
author: UltPanda
